body: use msdbgoset nocount on;select p.[name] as profile_name,       p.[description] as [description],       a.[name] as account_name,       a.[description] as account_description,       a.[email_address],       a.[display_name],       a.[replyto_address],       s.[servertype],       s.[servername],       s.[port],       s.[username],       s.[credential_id],       s.[use_default_credentials],       s.[enable_ssl],       s.[flags],       s.[timeout],       s.[last_mod_user]  from dbo.sysmail_profile as p        inner join dbo.sysmail_profileaccount as pa on p.profile_id = pa.profile_id        inner join dbo.sysmail_account as a on pa.account_id = a.account_id        inner join dbo.sysmail_server as s on a.account_id = s.account_id where 1 = 1   --and p.[name] like '%%' order by 1;
